# Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(data.table)
```

# Load dataset

```{r}
# Load the data using readxl library and remove missing values present in different formats

file = "~/group_18_project/_raw/radiation_dataset.xlsx"

hc_patient_data <- read_xlsx(path = file, na = c("unknown", "Unknown", "N/A", "Unkown", "unkown", "" ), sheet = 1)

patient_info1 <- read_excel(path = file, sheet = 2)

patient_info2 <- read_excel(path = file, sheet = 3)
```
